bill_title: prohibit the geographic reassignment of elected officials.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to prohibit the geographic reassignment of elected officials. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 12-1 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: No person elected to a public office to represent a particular geographic area within the State of South Dakota or any of its political subdivisions may be permanently transferred to a different geographic area during that person's term of office. 500 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
